A customizable digital picture frame that allows users to upload their own images and videos, and can also be synced with social media accounts to automatically display new photos.
A modular frame that can be easily reconfigured to fit different sizes and shapes of pictures, with interchangeable panels and customizable colors.
A frame with built-in lighting that can adjust to the ambient light in the room, ensuring that the photos displayed are always properly illuminated.
A frame with a touch screen interface that allows users to browse and select photos directly from the frame, without needing to use a separate device.
A frame with a built-in speaker and microphone, allowing users to play music and make phone calls directly from the frame.
